thread.title: Greek stocks end higher but banks retreat after rebound
thread.title_full: Greek stocks end higher but banks retreat after rebound

title: Greek stocks end higher but banks retreat after rebound
text:
Tip : Use comma (,) to separate multiple quotes. Learn more... 
Fri, Aug 7, 2015, 15:51 BST - UK Markets close in 39 mins. Greek stocks end higher but banks retreat after rebound Reuters – 7 minutes ago ATHENS (Reuters) - Greek bank shares closed lower on Friday, giving up earlier gains that followed a strong rebound on Thursday with the broader stock market (.ATG) ending 1.45 percent higher. 
The Athens bourse's banking index (.FTATBNK) lost 1.67 percent after rebounding 17.8 percent on Thursday. 
(Reporting by George Georgiopoulos) Follow the quotes you care about most. Access timely news and investment updates to stay on top of the market. … More » Yahoo UK & Ireland Finance Terms
